description.value:
Your belief in a higher power fuels your psychic abilities. Whether your mental abilities truly come to you as a divine gift or are simply enhanced by the power of your belief, none can say. In many ways, you resemble a divine caster, and prayers often factor into your casting of psychic spells.

Phrenic Pool Ability: Wisdom

Bonus Spells: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wa0zb2pncesmm9lz]{Bless} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.avofn5q2v0f0qxjy]{Spiritual Weapon} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.73han2zqxg59u18g]{Magic Vestment} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.io8sg720zjd0tdj2]{Guardian Of Faith} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.p2kosvizylhy8vfa]{Commune} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.21yha04trfhj0ehd]{Psychic Surgery} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.glt6uk3n6g6l2p6l]{Scrying, Greater} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.0wamdkl9gp19l55w]{Planar Ally, Greater} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.suel7sgnztenv551]{Miracle} (18th).
